==== What was done engineering wise? ====
We received a freeze exception this week and uploaded the 3.5.0-17.28
kernel.  This most notably contained some critical bug fixes for the
following:

* Bug:1061599 - beagle: omap3: usb is dead
* Bug:1021471 - clone() hang when creating new network namespace
* Bug:1030233 -not have bluetooth usb 0489:e046 Foxconn / Hon Hai 
* Bug:717970 - After sleep, key presses get lost and trackpad is jittery

As usual, we also uploaded this kernel to the 
ppa:ubuntu-x-swat/q-lts-backport PPA to facilitate testing of the
12.10   kernel in 12.04.  Please test and let us know your results.

==== What's about to land that might impact the other teams and release as a whole? ====
Nothing at this time.

==== Summary of bugs working on by team (reasonably reliable) ====

* Bug:1011828 - Session failed to laod with 12.10 kernel on 12.04 test
* Bug:993506 - nvidia kernel module fails to build on 3.4.x kernel [fatal error: asm/system.h: No such file or directory]
** Fixed in Quantal, but want it SRU'd for Precise as it will affect anyone running a 12.10 kernel in 12.04
* Bug:994255 - bcmwl-kernel-source 5.100.82.38+bdcom-0ubuntu6.1: bcmwl kernel module failed to build [fatal error: asm/system.h: No such file or directory]
** Fixed in Quantal, but want it SRU'd for Precise as it will affect anyone running a 12.10 kernel in 12.04
* Bug:1022578 - [omap3beagle - omap3beagle, recording] No sound at all
* Bug:1025663 - DMIStringIndexOutOfRange on HP Proliant ML110 G5
* Bug:1031831 - 3.5.0-7.7~precise1-generic works except for broadcom bcmwl-kernel-source failure
* Bug:1030894 - have to add nomodeset to the kernel commandline in order to boot with kernel 3.5.0-6
* Bug:1034338 -  Quantal-alpha boot on iMac 5,1 requires acpi=off
* Bug:1039402 - [quantal] overlayfs over r/o NFS mount fails to overwrite existing files
* Bug:1042213 - [quantal] Kernel oops with NFS mount
* Bug:1043338 - Second suspend reliably fails (nouveau)
* Bug:1043403 - Wireless not active during installation or after boot
* Bug:1044151 - Toshiba battery always reports 51% charged when fully charged
* Bug:1047527 - Dual-Role OTG device on non-HNP port - unable to enumerate USB device on port 1
* Bug:1051855 - Broadcom bluetooth device BCM20702A0 [0a5c:21f1] not supported
* Bug:1052064 - External USB hard disks are not seen when connected to docking station
* Bug:1052278 - [ASUS][X501U][X401U] Fn + F8 display mode switch hot key will switch the mode 2 times by one single key stroke
* Bug:1053897 - kernel does not boot without noefi on commandline
* Bug:1054129 - reboot with -vga cirrus can result in broken output
* Bug:1054732 - [LENOVO 4298R86] suspend/resume failure
* Bug:1055534 - [regression] since linux 3.4.0, kswapd0 uses 100% cpu
* Bug:1065263 - wrong stride for efifb on some systems
